Changelog
---------

Here you can see the full list of changes between each Inflection release.

0.1.2 (2012-03-13)
++++++++++++++++++

- Added Python 2.5 support.

0.1.1 (2012-02-24)
++++++++++++++++++

- Fixed some files not included in the distribution package.

0.1.0 (2012-02-24)
++++++++++++++++++

- Initial public release
